Posts.Content: Nov 25, 2009 06:55PM - edited Nov 25, 2009 07:11PM by helenO i had breast cancer first when I was 35 years old and then the other breast when i was 48 they did not get all the cells there was muscle involvement . i did radiation and chemo and then we just waited.  read your post and I am new to this site .  I am 51 now, and the bad new s has been coming fast.  my right mastectomy has a rash and it looks very  much like a recur.rence- its been 3 years since the mastectomy.  I do not want to do any more toxic chemo especially carboplatin ad taxol , which are the drugs I took , i am down and having trouble sleeping even a little.  I am hoping they will just give me radiation, il even do surgery, but idont think they will offer it because the area of the rash is not small.  I have a loving husband and a sensitive loving daughter and I hate to see them, see me, going through all this fear and all.  I am so down, I just obsesss about dying now so they  wont see me suffer anymore.  Are the anti depressants helping with that?  I  am so scared , which i think may be worse than the depression.
